title: Jet Skiing
short_description: High-octane water racing on powerful personal watercrafts.
long_description:
Jet Skiing is the motorcycle riding of the sea. It uses a Personal Watercraft (PWC) to zip across water surfaces at high speeds. It is one of the most readily available water sports in India, found on almost every commercial beach.

While most tourists experience this as a pillion rider with an instructor driving (for safety in crowded zones), several locations allow you to drive yourself under supervision. The thrill of cutting through waves, feeling the spray of salt water, and the raw power of the engine makes it an exhilarating short-duration adventure.

locations.summary: Crowded but fun. Good for a quick thrill.
Rajiv Gandhi Water Sports Complex offers organized rides.
Available at Paradise Beach and Chunnambar Boat House.
Nagaon and Varsoli beaches offer ample water sports.
Less crowded rides at Om Beach.

opening_hours.time_notes: Closed during high tide or rough weather warnings.

pricing_metadata.disclaimer: Rates are per round (usually very short, 2-3 mins).

safety_guidelines: Always wear the kill-switch lanyard if driving (stops engine if you fall).
Keep distance from swimmers and other boats.
Hold on tight to the instructor's waist handles.
Do not attempt sharp turns at high speed.
equipment_checklist: Sunglasses (risk of losing them is high)
major_experiences: Feeling the power of a marine engine

sample_itinerary.one_day: Walk to beach water sports zone. Pay at counter. Put on life jacket. Wade into water to mount the ski. 3-minute exhilarating ride. Wade back.

booking_details.how_to_reach: Available at most commercial tourist beaches in India.

seo.seo_description: Rent a Jet Ski in Goa or Andaman. Prices start ₹400 per round. Find best beaches for water sports and safety tips.

highlights: Most widely available water sport in India.
High speed on water provides unique adrenaline.
Can be combined in 'Water Sports Packages' (Banana ride + Jet Ski + Parasailing) for value.
Safe for children when accompanied by an adult/instructor.
Andaman offers cleaner water and less crowded riding zones.
